credit_line: Selection from the Peterson Collection, Gift of William Bingham II
title: Portraits of great scholars of the Tang Dynasty
inscriptions: u. edge at beginning of scroll in blue ink: FROM/ HUDSON & CO./ Ningpo, China/ via Siberia.; u. edge on tapestry cover in black ink: 393. Inscription says he saw a very famous painting by a Ming Dynasty artist and tried to imitate it, and hopes the viewer will agree with him.
